snippet.title: Data-driven policy and commerce requires algorithmic transparency
snippet.description: The romance of a better world through data is over. It's time to look deeper at who is using big data, how they're using it, and for the benefit of whom.

snippet.title: The price for free Android apps may be your privacy
snippet.description: In-app advertising receives the same permission set as the host app. Michael Kassner reviews what that controversial decision means to the user.

snippet.title: Geek Gifts 2011: Steve Jobs biography by Walter Isaacson

snippet.title: Why Google Plus is about to change the Web as we know it
snippet.description: After a series of failed attempts at social networking, Google may have nailed it with Google+. See why and how it could have a major impact on the future of the Web.

snippet.title: iPad vs laptop: Can Apple's tablet be your office computer?
snippet.description: Apple's iPad has lots to offer the average consumer - but what about the average office worker?
